content: The power of a god cannot be overcome. >> Zanzar, this is the providence of the world. Even gods are merely being restricted to the limited power determined by powers that power although great is not unlimited. That voice, how dare you disobey me? I am Monado. I was here at the beginning and I will proclaim the end. >> We're back to that impossible drug it is time for you to choose does this world belong to Zanzar or does it belong to you? That is something I decided long ago. >> We use our power to fell a god and these are destiny. >> It's fainting the memory of a gods existence born from the chaos of creation.
